sense.def:
To minimize something
pomeni nekaj obdržati v kar najmanjšem obsegu.

seg.quote: Our aim must be to minimize the risks.
Crop rotations will help to minimise disease.

sense.def:
To minimize something
pomeni tudi prikazati nekaj kot manjše ali manj pomembno, kot je v resnici.

seg.quote: He was careful to minimise his role in these proceedings.
